top_stories.title: Anthropic says some Claude models can now end ‘harmful or abusive’ conversations
top_stories.description: Anthropic says new capabilities allow its latest AI models to protect themselves by ending abusive conversations.
top_stories.author: Anthony Ha
top_stories.content: Anthropic says new capabilities allow its latest AI models to protect themselves by ending abusive conversations.

top_stories.title: OpenAI Launches GPT-5, the Next Step in Its Quest for AGI
top_stories.description: The wait is finally over. Today, right now, OpenAI is releasing its latest and greatest large language model, GPT-5, and making it available through the ChatGPT interface. According to OpenAI’s leaders, the model brings unprecedented powers of reasoning, brings vibe coding to a new level, is better than ever at agentic AI tasks, and comes with a raft of new safety features. “It’s a significant step along the path of AGI,” said OpenAI CEO Sam Altman at a press briefing yesterday, referring to...
top_stories.author: Eliza Strickland
top_stories.content: The wait is finally over. Today, right now, OpenAI is releasing its latest and greatest large language model, GPT-5, and making it available through the ChatGPT interface. According to OpenAI’s leaders, the model brings unprecedented powers of reasoning, brings vibe coding to a new level, is better than ever at agentic AI tasks, and comes with a raft of new safety features. “It’s a significant step along the path of AGI,” said OpenAI CEO Sam Altman at a press briefing yesterday, referring to...

top_stories.title: New research could block AI models learning from your online content
top_stories.description: “Noise” protection can be added to content before it’s uploaded online. A new technique developed by Australian researchers could stop unauthorised artificial intelligence (AI) systems learning from photos, artwork and other image-based content. Developed by CSIRO, Australia’s national science agency, in partnership with the Cyber Security Cooperative Research Centre (CSCRC) and the University of Chicago, […]
top_stories.author: CSIRO
top_stories.content: “Noise” protection can be added to content before it’s uploaded online. top_stories.title: Elastic joins AWS Zero Trust Accelerator for Government (ZTAG) program
top_stories.description: Elastic is proud to be officially recognized as an AWS Zero Trust for Government partner and for onboarding into the AWS Zero Trust Accelerator for Government (ZTAG) program in the US. By integrating Elastic’s data-centric approach with AWS’s Zero trust framework, this partnership empowers US federal agencies to accelerate and operationalize their Zero Trust adoption efforts.The release and timing of any features or functionality described in this post remain at Elastic's sole discretion. Any...

top_stories.title: The End of Limitless Compute: AI’s Physical Reality
top_stories.description: For developers, compute has long been an abstraction—a limitless resource summoned with an API call. That illusion is now shattering against hard physical realities. The voracious appetite of AI means the success of your next application may depend less on the elegance of your algorithm and more on your cloud provider’s ability to navigate aContinue reading "The End of Limitless Compute: AI’s Physical Reality" The post The End of Limitless Compute: AI’s Physical Reality appeared first on...
